item.description:
We'll just be a bunch of pilots and friends meeting this month!

Brian Smith, from GALE Assoc., will be giving us an update on their involvement with Fitchburg Airport. They are the firm hired to do the planning and development. Like the runway expansion for example.

June's meeting will be a fun one. We can look over our sucess of LTF Day, look at a slide show on it (once someone decides to make it for us).

We will go over the details for the weekends Young Eagles event also. This is our semi annual Young Eagles event. Murph will round the troops together before we begin our real FPA Fly Outs time again for the summer!

More will follow as the time gets closer.


As always, Fly Often and Fly Safe.
See you all soon.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

BBQ at 6:00 and meeting at 7:00.

Where else can you have this much excitement for $25 bucks a year?

Fly Often and Fly Safe,
Charley

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association EAA Chapter 1454 Monthly Meetup
